commitMessage: @@@[CALCITE-4251] Support Calc and SetOp operator in RelMdAllPredicates (Xu Zhaohui)

@@@[CALCITE-4199] Add nullability annotations

The commit includes javadoc updates and refactorings made by Julian Hyde in https://github.com/apache/calcite/pull/2278

@@@[CALCITE-4422] Add MethodCanBeStatic check via ErrorProne

private and final methods can be made static.  so it is clear they do not access instance fields
